name: Planet Hopping!
description: Planet Hopping is a small prototype made for a final school assignment. The controls are as follows: use 'a' and 'd' to walk, use 'space' to jump, use 'shift' to shoot, and use 'p' to pause. The objective of this prototype is to collect all of the treasure spread out across the level. Thank you for checking it out and comments about anything are greatly appreciated!
